description: This header file defines utility functions under the Utils namespace for file and property handling, including reading property values from files, reading file contents, checking regular files, searching files recursively, and processing strings with variable expansion.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads a property value from a configuration file based on the property name, supporting recursive expansion if the value starts with '$'.

methods.name: bool readFileContent(const char * filename,string & content)
methods.description: Reads the entire content of a file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks if a given path corresponds to a regular file.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches directories for files matching patterns, with support for exclusions and limiting results.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Initiates a recursive file search from a starting directory, with depth and exclusion filters.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Processes a string to replace variables (denoted with '$') with their values from a property file.

ctags.pattern: /^inline bool readFileContent(const char* filename, string& content)$/

ctags.signature: (string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)

ctags.signature: (std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
